title: Autonomous Learning Space Design and Diffusion Strategies for Educational Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general understanding of educational systems
context.additional_context: A course focused on autonomous space utilization and strategy development for diffusing innovation in science education, analyzing practical applications of central-local collaboration models.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles for designing autonomous learning spaces for educational innovation.
Learners can establish strategies for diffusing educational innovation under a central-local collaboration system.
Learners can propose actionable innovation plans for real educational settings through small-scale project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
